text: wkthyr min alquraa 'ahlakna 'ahliha bsbb mukhalafat rusulana wtkdhybhm, fa'aeqabahum dhlk khizy aldunya mwswla bdhll alakhrt, fja'hm edhabna marat wahum nayimun laylana wamaratan wahum nayimun nharana. wkhass allah hdhyn alwqtyn; li'anahuma wqtan llskwn walastraht, fmjy' aleadhab fihima afze washd
